title: If you could travel back in time to 5000 BC, which technologies would be the first you show to people? (Ignoring the language problems) - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m assuming it’s infeasible to introduce any technology that could not be manufactured with metal-working, which cuts down suitable options for quick instruction. Glass-making would be relatively easy to implement in any area with sand.Phonetic alphabets for writing would be something one could teach locals in nearly any area without industrial manufacturing, as well as the concept of zero.Possibly the shadoof if I’m in area where irrigation would be possible.

If you could travel back in time to 5000 BC, which technologies would be the first you show to people? (Ignoring the language problems) You are talking about 1,000 years before the garden of Eden. Technology would not mean much. Remember, it takes the combined effort of thousands of people to make even a spoon. You would not even be able to feed yourself.
